Button.TooltipReference: Dump your guild info to a file.
Make the selected Player the new Guild Leader (Guild Leader only).
Promote the selected player to Officer (GuildLeader only), player must be targetted.
Demote the selected player from Officer to Member (GuildLeader or self only).
Remove the player from the guild (Higher rank or self only).

Button.TooltipReference: Change the public note to the text input (Officer only).

Button.TooltipReference: Change the personal note to the text input.
